resources.string: Are you sure you want to reset the list ?
India is a country in South Asia that occupies most of the Indian subcontinent.
Northern Ireland, or simply the United Kingdom (UK), is a sovereign country in Western Europe.
The United States of America is a federal republic of 50 states. It is the world\'s third largest country in size and nearly the third largest in terms of population.
Wales â€“ a country that is part of the United Kingdom, bordered by England to its east and the Atlantic Ocean and Irish Sea to its west.
Puerto Rico is a self-governing island commonwealth of the West Indies, associated with the United States.
Nepal is a landlocked country located between India to the east, south, and west and the Tibet Autonomous Region of China to the north.
